mapper.select: select t1.id,contract_name,contract_type,company_id,DATE_FORMAT(t1.create_at, '%Y-%m-%d') create_at,DATE_FORMAT(begin_date, '%Y-%m-%d') begin_date,DATE_FORMAT(end_date, '%Y-%m-%d') end_date,status, t1.file_one_id,t1.file_two_id,sign_company,t2.company_name, DATE_FORMAT(t1.update_at, '%Y-%m-%d') update_at, DATE_FORMAT(upload_time_one, '%Y-%m-%d') upload_time_one,DATE_FORMAT(upload_time_two, '%Y-%m-%d') upload_time_two,t1.creater from t_contract t1 LEFT JOIN t_subcontract t2 on t1.company_id =t2.id where t1.id=#{ID}
select file_one_id,file_two_id from t_contract where id=#{ID}
